chara.textHome: I’m usually holed up in my room, and there@isn’t much to tell you about at all.
I mean, me talking about gaming and@posting on message boards isn’t something@I think you'd enjoy listening to.
Though, I don’t like the way I am@right now.
I admire someone who is sociable,
and the truth is,@I wanna be like that, too.
Maybe it’s ‘cause I like paranormal phenomena,@conspiracy theories and stuff,
but I thought Magical Girls were one of@those kinda things.
But that was just Jun,@so I guess it was kinda rash of me.
My reason for becoming a Magical Girl@was regressive,
but looking back, I guess it wasn't so bad.
In a way, it gave me a chance to change,@didn’t it?
Escaping from reality 24/7 —@that’s also a skill if you master it.
Yup yup. Guess I'm more or less starting@to get the hang of this character.
Of course,@it's futile to play a character.
After all, all it is,@is a false self.
Still, y’know, I believe that if I can leave@a legend behind, I will be able to change.
Hunting Witches, protecting people,
and making everyone smile while smiling.
I wonder if my many successes are now at@the level of being passed on across the sea?
I’ve got a feeling I'm about to change —@into a self I wouldn’t be ashamed of!
…I've realized.
No matter how strong I get, it doesn't@mean anything if I lose my footing and@fall apart…
It's no good to be the kind of person@who can easily fall into a hole in my@heart like that.
That's why I gotta change!
I must gain the strength to become@independent.
Whoa, wait a minute,@you're already here…?
I, uhh,@haven't really prepped for this,
I mean, it's not that easy for me@to get into character.
Ahh crap, what now...
Oww, so blinding!
It's been too long since I was exposed@to the morning sun,
I feel a twinge behind my eyes.
But, it feels good.
It makes me feel just a little bit brighter.
If you wanna play online games, it's@better to do it during the daytime@than at night,
when there are more people around.
Fyi, it's easier to form a party that way.
Ah, I'll take the target over here.
“There’s no need for a@self-introduction.”
“What matters is the fact that you@and I met here and now!”
…is what the character I’m fighting@as would say.
Don’t leave me, okay…
Th-thx…
...for going out of your way to deliver@my school handouts.
I'm totally fine with my studies,@so don't worry about it.
See, I'm not behind everyone else, either.
Gdi… What’s wrong with this anonfail@who always shows up at night…?
Stop spamming the same thing over@and over again, ffs.
Too much scrolling,@and the logs are way too long.
Huh…?
Oh— Ahh!
Not good, I fell asleep.
This is a weird time.
My sense of time’s all messed up,@man…
Lmao, lemme post that on the board.
Of course I'm all set.
Looks like there are Witches pretty@close by,
so let's hurry up and exterminate them!
After all, that’s our mission.
No, no, wait a sec.
What’s the Endless Mirrors?
If I were in a place like that,@I'd be exposed—
everyone’s gonna know what I’m@really like…!
I will stop this conflict, no cap!
I'm going to use my taser gun to@give them one quick numbing zap,
and incapacitate them all!
I-I'm not being sus or anything at all.
I mean, I go to convenience stores@from time to time.
‘Cause, well, I just suddenly felt like@getting a soda or something.
I figured if I went to a net cafe,@I could do what I wanted,
while also changing how things@were going.
But actually, I'm just getting holed up@in a different place, aren’t I?
Ko—a—a—ah…!
Oh, that was dangerous…
I tried… to speak loudly, but my vocal cords@were so startled that they didn't move…
Sorry, did I scare you…?
Not here, @not here…
*groans*
My snack stash is gone…
I wanted to watch anime while@eating popcorn…
It's easy to stay shut-in and@unchanged all the time.
But hey, I know it's nice outside too.
Someone there taught me about@happiness.
U-umm,
this is pretty embarrassing now, but…
I used to think that Magical Girls
were connected to the cops,@or some other state authority.
The Tomorrow Shop is a place of@remembrance.
Jun is the one who brought me a@whole new time.
The way you see the world changes@completely depending on the environment@that surrounds you.
I know that all too well.
If I was too slow I would be scolded,
and if I failed to keep up with my friends@I would be treated like a weird kid,
plus I wanted to study only my@favorite subjects more.
School slowly became more and more@of a pain to me.
Do you know this piece?
It's traditional Fantasy, but it's super@leet, with a lot of elaborate strategizing.
I totally love it,@and I collect figurines of it.
Wanna have a look?
Through this battle, I will change!
Good, it looks like I helped@everyone out!
I guess this gives me a little pep@in my step!
With this accumulation,@I will surely change, right…?
You thought you won?@That’s just a trick!
This way, I’ll be able to handle gaming@all night.
Finally, here I am…!
I can surely chuck away my@gloomy self now!
I've made so many mistakes, it's@embarrassing just to talk about myself…
I’ve always loved the world of swords@and sorcery,
or like, the Fantasy genre.
That’s why I’ve always had a longing for@beings who are far removed from reality.
